meanings.definition: The oval reproductive body laid by the females of birds, reptiles, fish, insects, and some other animals.
meanings.sent1: The hen carefully sat on her eggs to keep them warm.
meanings.sent2: I love having scrambled eggs for breakfast.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chicken sit on the remote control? To keep her eggs safe!
meanings.sent4: The treasure chest was filled with golden eggs of various sizes.
meanings.sent5: The scientist studied the eggs under a microscope to learn more about their development.

meanings.definition: A female bird's egg, especially when used as food.
meanings.sent1: Mom made delicious omelets with fresh eggs from the farm.
meanings.sent2: The baker used eggs to make the cake fluffy and moist.
meanings.sent3: Why did the egg go to school? To get a little eggucation!
meanings.sent4: The chef cracked the egg with precision, separating the yolk from the white.
meanings.sent5: The children eagerly searched for Easter eggs hidden in the garden.

meanings.sent1: She gently placed a hat on her friend's eggs to protect him from the sun.
meanings.sent2: The baby giggled when his mother kissed the top of his eggs.
meanings.sent3: Why did the student carry a ladder on his eggs? He wanted to reach new heights!
meanings.sent4: The detective scratched his eggs, trying to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a portrait capturing the unique features of the man's eggs.
